description:
PPC Ads - Google Adwords Facebook Ads & Bing Ads Using PPC


Do You Need Website Traffic And You Need It NOW?

How would you like to discover a super-simple way to drive low-cost traffic to your website? (from Google ads, Yahoo ads, Bing ads and Facebook ads)

With Pay Per Click (PPC) and online Paid Advertising networks, now you can!

Imagine having a paid advertising expert walking you through each step of:

  • A walkthrough of the top online advertising networks and their best use
  • Setting up your ad campaigns on Google AdWords
  • Setting up your ad campaigns with Facebook ads
  • Setting up your ad campaigns with Yahoo ads & Bing ads (Microsoft Ad Network)
  • Details of what you need to do on Google, Yahoo, Facebook and Bing, and why
  • How to write quality ads for your Pay Per Click (PPC) ad campaigns

In this course, we'll take a "tour" of the top 9 paid ads networks, show you how to set up your Google AdWords PPC account and walk you through the basics of setting up online ad campaigns on the top 3 pay per click ad networks:

  • Google AdWords
  • Facebook Ads Network and
  • Microsoft Ads Network (Yahoo ads / Bing ads)

And, I will walk you through the process, step-by-step.

If you are new to online advertising, then this is the course for you...

Enroll today, and begin receiving website traffic immediately upon completing this course!

We will cover all the terminology you need to learn, as well as give you a practical demonstration of the top paid ads (PPC) / online ad networks.

Take a look at the free preview lectures below and get ready to drive as much traffic as you want to your website!

Your enrollment today is backed by Udemy's 30-day, money-back guarantee, so you risk nothing by trying it out!
title: PPC Ads - Google Adwords Facebook Ads & Bing Ads Using PPC
